summary: This mod adds the ancient vampire Kain to black briar manor.
descriptionHtml:
'From the shards of tattered dreams i rose, unwilling. tossed upon tides of pain which flowed and ebbed, leaving me searingly awake, and more revoltingly alive!' -kain

EDIT: Im not dead, i just got super busy stuff going on... work stuff.
Thanks, sorry and do what you want with these files :)

============================================================
DESCRIPTION
============================================================

If you don't know anything about Kain i recommend you buy all five legacy of Kain games right now.
Its been over seven years since i uploaded elder Kain for morrowind http://morrowind.nexusmods.com/mods/37578 and time has come yet again for Kain to grace his presence in a Tamriel.
Warning i used really high details for this mod so it might be slow on lower end pcs.
If he is naked when you meet him trade with him to activate the stuff he has on him, i have no idea why that is happening.

You can find him hanging out at riften black briar manor, his armor is in a barrel in the same building.
To reunite Kain with the Soul reaver download this mod by Spazthemax
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14985

This mod is a huge wip so i expect you to find bugs (cloak being one of them and i just noticed it looking at the screenshots). Im working on making Kains race more playable with a female variant. I plan on a few things including
- Blood omen 2 armor
- Pre fallen Raziel armor (not sure how i skin his cloak)
- The sanctuary of the clans or the pillars of Nosgoth pre Bloodomen
- Vorador race
- Maybe Raziel, im not sure anyone would actually play him.
Most of what i have planned i had ready for Oblivion so i just need to update it.

INSTALLATION
============================================================
Unzip into the Data folder Or drag all the contents into the Data folder tick the mod in the Skyrim launcher.

============================================================
INVISIBLE ARMOUR AND PROBLEMS FINDING ARMOUR

Ok, now that the caps got your attention....
If you can't find Kains armour. He has it in his inventory. He just enjoys his nakedness while he's not your follower. 
I mean....he's traveled through time and been killed, brought back to life, ruled the world, seen his race get destroyed..... he sort of deserves to be naked on his days off...

But yeah, when he's a companion, you'll see it in his inventory and he'll equip it.

And if the armor is invisible and all you see is a floating bald head along with a massive bow. We'll then...Kain does have a series of vampiric powers...
You just have to up date the mod. Download the update in the files section.

Installation is easy enough. If you dont use a mod manager then, install as usual and replace any existing files that the original mod made. 
If you use NMM then just install it, activate it along with the main mod and allow it to use the newer files in place of the main one.

Your bad ass vampire companion will follow you and will be visible and dressed appropriately <3
